burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld.macro

Class MacroCellVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld.GridWorldVisualizer
      • burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld.macro.MacroCellVisualizer

  • public class MacroCellVisualizer
extends GridWorldVisualizer
    A class for visualizing the reward weights assigned to a Macro-cell in a Macro-cell grid world. Reward weights provided are first normalized to lie between 0 and 1. Macro cells are filled in with color that ranges from white if the reward weight is 0, to blue if the reward weight 1. The agent is rendered as a grey circle.
    Author:
    Stephen Brawner and Mark Ho; modified by James MacGlashan

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MacroCellVisualizer.MacroCellRewardWeightPainter
      Class for painting the macro cells a color between white and blue, where strong blue indicates strong reward weights.

                                       MacroCellGridWorld.InMacroCellPF[] propFunctions,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> rewardMap)
        Returns a Visualizer for the Macro-Cell GridWorld Visualizer and reward weights associated with a set of MacroCell Propositional functions.
        Parameters:
        map - a map of the grid world
        propFunctions - the macro cell propositional functions
        rewardMap - the reward weights associated with the propositional function names
        Returns:
        a Visualizer
